refnamediv.refpurpose: Represents a declared action in a policy file.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Synopsis

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This class is used to represent a entries in policy files.

refsect2.title: PolKitPolicyFileEntry
refsect2.para: Objects of this class are used to record information about a policy.

refsect2.title: PolKitPolicyFileEntryAnnotationsForeachFunc ()
refsect2.programlisting: polkit_bool_t (*PolKitPolicyFileEntryAnnotationsForeachFunc) (PolKitPolicyFileEntry *policy_file_entry, const char *key, const char *value, void *user_data);
refsect2.para: Callback function for polkit_policy_file_entry_annotations_foreach().

listitem.simpara: Pass TRUE to short-circuit, e.g. stop the iteration

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_ref ()
refsect2.para: Increase reference count.

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_unref ()
refsect2.para: Decreases the reference count of the object. If it becomes zero, the object is freed. Before freeing, reference counts on embedded objects are decresed by one.

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_debug ()
refsect2.para: Print debug information about object

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_id ()
refsect2.para: Get the action identifier.

listitem.simpara: A string - caller shall not free this string.

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_default ()
refsect2.para: Get the the default policy for this policy.

listitem.simpara: A PolKitPolicyDefault object - caller shall not unref or modify this object.

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_action_description ()
refsect2.para: Get the description of the action that this policy entry describes. This is intended to be used in policy editors, for example "Mount internal volumes". Contrast with polkit_policy_file_entry_get_action_message(). The textual string will be returned in the current locale.
Note, if polkit_context_set_load_descriptions() on the PolKitContext object used to get this object wasn't called, this method will return NULL.

listitem.simpara: string or NULL if descriptions are not loaded - caller shall not free this string

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_action_message ()
refsect2.para: Get the message describing the action that this policy entry describes. This is to be used in dialogs, for example "System Policy prevents mounting this volume". Contrast with polkit_policy_file_entry_get_action_description(). The textual string will be returned in the current locale.
Note, if polkit_context_set_load_descriptions() on the PolKitContext object used to get this object wasn't called, this method will return NULL.

listitem.simpara: string or NULL if descriptions are not loaded - caller shall not free this string

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_action_vendor ()
refsect2.para: Get the name of the vendor of this action.
Note, if polkit_context_set_load_descriptions() on the PolKitContext object used to get this object wasn't called, this method will return NULL.

listitem.simpara: string or NULL if descriptions are not loaded or vendor tag isn't set - caller shall not free this string

refsect2.para: Since 0.7

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_action_vendor_url ()
refsect2.para: Get the URL of the vendor of this action.
Note, if polkit_context_set_load_descriptions() on the PolKitContext object used to get this object wasn't called, this method will return NULL.

listitem.simpara: string or NULL if descriptions are not loaded or vendor url isn't set - caller shall not free this string

refsect2.para: Since 0.7

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_action_icon_name ()
refsect2.para: Get the name of the icon that represents the action. This name conforms to the freedesktop.org icon naming specification.
Note, if polkit_context_set_load_descriptions() on the PolKitContext object used to get this object wasn't called, this method will return NULL.

listitem.simpara: string or NULL if descriptions are not loaded or icon tag isn't set - caller shall not free this string

refsect2.para: Since 0.7

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_annotations_foreach ()
refsect2.para: Iterate over all annotations on the policy file entry.

listitem.simpara: user data to pass to the callback function
TRUE only if the iteration was short-circuited

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_annotation ()
refsect2.para: Look of the value of a given annotation.

listitem.simpara: The value of the annotation or NULL if not found.

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_get_default_factory ()
refsect2.para: Get the factory defaults for the entry. This may be different that what polkit_policy_file_entry_get_default() returns if the function polkit_policy_file_entry_set_default() have been used to change the defaults.

listitem.simpara: A PolKitPolicyDefault object - caller shall not unref or modify this object.

refsect2.para: Since 0.7

refsect2.title: polkit_policy_file_entry_set_default ()
refsect2.para: Set new defaults for a given policy file entry; subsequent calls to polkit_policy_file_get_default() will return these values. Note that the old defaults are not modified; they are still available via polkit_policy_file_entry_get_default_factory().
This operation requires the org.freedesktop.policykit.modify-defaults authorization and will fail if the caller lacks it.

listitem.simpara: return location for error or NULL
TRUE if the given defaults was set; FALSE if error is set.

refsect2.para: Since 0.7
